text: int main ( ) { int t , a [ 100001 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { long long int count = 0 ; int i , j , n ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; if ( n == 1 ) count = 1 ; for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 1 ; ( i < n ) && ( a [ i ] >= a [ i - 1 ] ) ; i ++ , j ++ ) ; count += ( 1 << j ) - 1 ; } printf ( "%lld\n" , count ) ; } return 0 ; }
